p: Chloroquine (CQ) sensitive ANKA strain of Plasmodium berghei was used. The donor mice infected with the parasite was obtained from the EHNRI. The parasites were maintained by serial blood passage from mouse to mouse at 5Â days interval. All procedures followed were in accordance with the Guide for the Care and Use of Laboratory Animals [ 24] and were approved by the Institutional Review Board of the SoP, College of Health Sciences, AAU.
